titlestmt.titleproper: Merrill, Elmer Drew, 1876-1956. Letters from Elmer Drew Merrill, 1946: A Guide.

change.item: arn00001 converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2006-06-08).

titlepage.titleproper: Merrill, Elmer Drew, 1876-1956. Letters from Elmer Drew Merrill, 1946: A Guide.
titlepage.author: Archives, Arnold Arboretum Library, Harvard University Herbaria
titlepage.p: Â© The President and Fellows of Harvard College

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Given to library by E.D. Merrill.

bioghist.head: Biography:
bioghist.p: Elmer Drew Merrill worked for the U.S. government in the Philippines, 1902-1923, and became a major figure in Philippine botany. He was director of the New York Botanic Garden from 1931-1935. At the time of these letters, he was director of the Arnold Arboretum, a post he held from 1937 to July 31, 1946.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content:
scopecontent.p: The collection contains letters pertaining to an attempt to get copies of Vols. 1 and 2 of the "Palau Tropical Biological Station Studies" in 1946, a manuscript for AN INDEX TO RAFINESQUE'S PUBLISHED TECHNICAL NAMES FOR THE CELLULAR CRYPTOGAMS by E. D. Merrill, and a manuscript "A Partial List of the Present Locations of Authentically Named William Roxburgh's Phanerogams Many Being Isotypes or Perhaps Holotypes of his Indian and Malayan Species. Also, Bank statement and canceled checks from November 1934.

did.unittitle: Containing 11 letters pertaining to an attempt to get copies of Vols. 1 and 2 of the "Palau Tropical Biological Station Studies" in 1946. Accompanied by a note from Merrill to Mrs. Schwarten describing this as "a good exhibit of red tape." And, manuscript for AN INDEX TO RAFINESQUE'S PUBLISHED TECHNICAL NAMES FOR THE CELLULAR CRYPTOGAMS by E. D. Merrill [published in FARLOWIA 1: 245-263 1943.]

Manuscript "A Partial List of the Present Locations of Authentically Named William Roxburgh's Phanerogams Many Being Isotypes or Perhaps Holotypes of his Indian and Malayan Species. (List of ferns sent about a year ago to recipients of these data.)" Compiled by E. D. Merrill, December 1952. Also, Bank statement and canceled checks from November 1934.

odd.p: Indexed in Main File under: Merrill, Elmer Drew, Palau Tropical Biological Station
